input_text:
Job Title: Manufacturing Engineer - Lathe Machining

Location: Cerritos, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Innovation | Staple of the Future | Take Ownership of End-to-End Operations | Work with New Machines! (over 1 Mill invested in new machinery)

This company, located in Cerritos, CA, is taking creation of products to the next level through engineering innovation. For over 25 years, their state-of-the-art technology serves premier technology companies around the globe. An elite team of about 100 employees work on a variety of machines including mills, lathes, mill turn, and grinders to manufacture precision equipment for their customers.

With an emphasis on innovation, this is a truly unique role to work on an elite team of highly innovative individuals. The M.E. in this role will take ownership of processes, being responsible for machine tools, programs, setup/operating documents, and fixtures. You will also work closely with machinists and engineers to support overall functioning of the shop including cost reduction, improved lead times, continuous growth, and more!

The ideal candidate will be highly motivated to make their mark in a hands on role spending time on the shop floor and in the office converting design models to CNC programs, establishing shop drawings for operators, set up and run FA samples, and being a resource for shop personnel, to name a few.

This is a 1st shift position with a flexible start time of 7 AM on Monday- Friday. The goal is to maintain a strong work-life balance.

Benefits for the role include: PTOHolidaysMedical/Dental/Vision401kVarious company events

Though not an extensive list, a few primary responsibilities will include: Converting design models to CNC programsManage CNC programming code, utilization and storageEstablish and improve machining processesPrepare and mange documentation for machining and fabricationDesign tooling and fixturesMake recommendations on purchasing capital equipment and tooling 4 year degree in technical field (Manufacturing, Industrial or Mechanical Engineering preferred)5+ years experience in CNC machining industry, preferably in a lead roleUse of 3D and 2D design/drafting (SolidWorks preferred)CNC Lathe programming required (Esprit preferred)Machining knowledge in grinder is preferred (Studer is a plus!)Strong troubleshooting/process improvement skillsAbility to train othersA proven ability to lead, energize, direct and motivate a great group of machinists, programmers and similarly, highly skilled,personnelMust comply with ITAR regulations AMC is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex including sexual orientation and gender identity, national origin, disability, protected Veteran Status, or any other characteristic protected by applicable federal, state, or local law.

“In accordance with California law, the expected salary range for this California position is between $90,000 and $120,000. The actual compensation will be determined based on experience and other factors permitted by law.”

PandoLogic. Keywords: Manufacturing Engineer, Location: Cerritos, CA - 90703

Experience Level (if available): None
